data.comment: The match has started at Nippert Stadium.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the away team.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Corner awarded to DC United.
In the minute 6, DC United's Donovan Pines attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Free kick DC United.
DC United's Donovan Pines goes close with a header against the bar.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cincinnati.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for DC United in the half of Cincinnati.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
In the minute 10, In Cincinnati, Cincinnati push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
DC United to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
Free kick for DC United in the half of Cincinnati.
In the minute 12, Steve Birnbaum (DC United) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for DC United close to the penalty box.
In the minute 12, Mathieu Deplagne (Cincinnati) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
DC United are pushing forward but Julian Gressel's finish is wide of the goal.
Rubiel Vazquez awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, DC United push upfield but Rubiel Vazquez quickly pulls them for offside.
Jurgen Locadia for Cincinnati is whistled offside.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a DC United throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
In the minute 20, Rubiel Vazquez signals a DC United throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of DC United.
In the minute 22, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to DC United.
Kevin Paredes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Kevin Paredes returns to the field for DC United after picking up a slight injury.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cincinnati.
In the minute 24, In Cincinnati DC United drive forward through Ulises Segura. His shot is on target but it's saved.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 25, DC United are caught offside.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, DC United's Yamil Asad gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
DC United will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cincinnati.
In the minute 30, Throw-in Cincinnati.
Joseph-Claude Gyau for Cincinnati drives towards goal at Nippert Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 33, Cincinnati have a dangerous throw-in.
In Cincinnati, Jurgen Locadia of Cincinnati is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Nippert Stadium, Russell Canouse has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 37, Free kick for DC United in the half of Cincinnati.
Caleb Stanko (Cincinnati) has received a yellow card from Rubiel Vazquez.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 41, In Cincinnati Cincinnati attack through Frankie Amaya. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for DC United at Nippert Stadium.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
In the minute 44, Can DC United capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cincinnati's half?
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The first-half is over at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Jaap Stam is making the team's first substitution at Nippert Stadium with Allan Cruz replacing Siem de Jong.
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
In the minute 48, Rubiel Vazquez awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick DC United.
Free kick for DC United in the half of Cincinnati.
In the minute 50, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a throw-in for Cincinnati, close to DC United's area.
DC United needs to be cautious. Cincinnati have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 52, DC United advance rapidly upfield but Rubiel Vazquez blows for offside.
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 55, Cincinnati to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
DC United's Julian Gressel misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cincinnati.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of DC United.
Throw-in high up the field for DC United in Cincinnati.
In the minute 60, Rubiel Vazquez awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
Ben Olsen (DC United) is making a first substitution, with Edison Flores replacing Ola Kamara.
Corner awarded to DC United.
Frederic Brillant (DC United) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 62, Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cincinnati close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Cincinnati's Allan Cruz gets in a shot but it is blocked by a DC United defender.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a Cincinnati throw-in in DC United's half.
Goal kick for DC United at Nippert Stadium.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Caleb Stanko with Adrien Regattin. This is the second substitution made today by Jaap Stam.
Jurgen Locadia (Cincinnati) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 69, Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Rubiel Vazquez.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
Throw-in DC United.
In the minute 70, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Cincinnati just outside DC United's area.
Cincinnati are coming forward and Adrien Regattin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rubiel Vazquez awards DC United a goal kick.
In the minute 72, In Cincinnati a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cincinnati pushes forward through Jurgen Locadia, whose finish on goal is saved.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 75, DC United make their second substitution with Joseph Mora replacing Kevin Paredes.
Federico Higuain is on a sub for Yamil Asad for DC United.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Cincinnati have a dangerous throw-in.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Yuya Kubo for Cincinnati gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for DC United at Nippert Stadium.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cincinnati.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
Throw-in DC United.
In the minute 84, Jurgen Locadia (Cincinnati) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Mohammed Abu is replacing Frederic Brillant for DC United at Nippert Stadium.
The away team replace Julian Gressel with Griffin Yow.
In the minute 88, Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Rubiel Vazquez signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Cincinnati.
Cincinnati surge into the attack at Nippert Stadium but Kendall Waston’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
Mohammed Abu for DC United has been booked by Rubiel Vazquez and receives a first yellow card.
